sources.title: The Great Mr. Handel
sources.description: Title: The Great Mr. Handel Summary: A lavish period drama produced in 1942 by Lord Rank's G.H.W. Productions Ltd. Directed by: Norman Walker Actors: Wilfrid Lawson, Elizabeth Allan, Malcolm Keen Production Company: G.H.W. Productions Ltd. Release Date: 9 November 1942 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A lavish period drama produced in 1942 by Lord Rank's G.H.W. Productions Ltd.

metadata.Plot: A lavish period drama produced in 1942 by Lord Rank's G.H.W. Productions Ltd.
metadata.Writer: Gerald Elliott, Victor MacLure, L. du Garde Peach
